title: Kansas City News Pool : Summer Daze , Clooney Conspiracy & Polyamory Rising
body_text:
Right now actress, producer & hottie Eva is holding strong at 49 and right now she inspires our peek at pop culture, community news and top headlines.
Check TKC news gathering . . .
Local Tourists Nobody Wants
These KC Athletes Are Heading To The Paris Olympics - Kansas City Magazine KC Athletes Are Heading To The Paris Olympics
From gymnasts to trapshooters, these Kansas City area athletes are taking their talents to the 2024 Paris Olympic Games.
Old School Cowtown Democratic Tradition Endures
League of Women Voters in KC are hosting series of forums ahead of busy election season
With a busy election season coming up, the League of Women Voters in Kansas City will be hosting a series of forums.
Anne Remains AMAZING!!!
Catch Up With Anne Peterson
Anne Peterson is back at KCTV5 after her induction into the Missouri Broadcasters Association Hall of Fame!
Classic Rock Tribute
How Huey Lewis changed the national anthem for Kansas City Chiefs fans forever
How did the Chiefs end up with one of the most recognizable fan-assisted Anthem endings in all of sports?
Wild Life Down By The River
Goats to graze Kansas City's Berkley Riverfront to reduce invasive vegetation
Port KC is bringing back the greatest vegetation snackers of all time - goats - to help tackle a project along the Missouri River.
Vacay Turned Photo Opp . . .
Eva Longoria, 49, shows off her ageless physique
Professional commitments took a backseat as Eva visited a picturesque Spanish beach with her family on Sunday afternoon.
Press Conference Proving Ground
Analysis: Biden's political position is rapidly deteriorating as critical news conference looms | CNN Politics
A staggering 24 hours that cracked the political foundation of Joe Biden's reelection bid leave him facing the most high-pressure presidential news conference in modern history on Thursday.
No Surprise From Big Apple
New York Times editorial board declares Trump 'unfit to lead'
Board calls Trump 'a chilling choice against this national moment' days before Republican national convention
Former Prez Conspiracy?!?
Obama knew in advance of George Clooney's bombshell call for Biden to drop out - but didn't object
Former President Barack Obama was given a heads-up but didn't object to Oscar-winning actor George Clooney's bombshell call for President Biden to drop out of the 2024 race, a new report says.
AOC Demands Disclosure
Ocasio-Cortez files impeachment articles against Supreme Court Justices Thomas, Alito
Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) on Wednesday introduced articles of impeachment against Supreme Court Justices Clarence Thomas and Samuel Alito, citing their "pattern of refusal to recuse" themselves from matters to which they are connected and their "failure to disclose" millions of dollars in gifts over decades.
GOP Talks Voting Rights & Wrongs
House passes GOP bill requiring proof of citizenship to vote, boosting election-year talking point
The House has passed a bill requiring proof of U.S. citizenship for voter registration. It's legislation Republicans have prioritized as an election-year talking point even as research shows noncitizens illegally registering and casting ballots in federal elections is exceptionally rare.
Holy Land Fight Forever
Escalation Between Israel and Hezbollah Hangs Over Gaza Cease-Fire Talks
The militant group's leader says "the only way" to stop the hostilities across the Lebanon-Israel border is to negotiate an end to the fighting in Gaza.
Far East Marching Orders
China tells NATO not to create chaos in Asia and rejects label of 'enabler' of Russia's Ukraine war
China has accused NATO of seeking security at the expense of others and told the alliance not to bring the same "chaos" to Asia.
Old Player Returns To European Theater
US cruise missiles to return to Germany, angering Moscow
The missiles will be deployed periodically from 2026 for the first time since the Cold War.
Don't Worry, You're Not Invited
Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani is set to throw a grand wedding for his son. Here's what to know
In March, Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani threw a three-day prenuptial bash for his son that included a 1,200-person guest list, including former world leaders, tech tycoons and Bollywood's megastars, and a performance by renowned singer Rihanna.
Tech Adapts To Moral Decay
The Sims is adding polyamorous relationships to the game
The company behind the franchise EA Games announced last month that a free update was coming out on July 25 - and it will allow characters to date multiple people simultaneously.
Bobby Witt, Jr. Earns EPIC Stats
Kansas City Royals All-Star Puts Up Historic Numbers Through First 400 Games
The Kansas City Royals will take the field . . .
Fading Cable TV Pays Tribute To Future Of Football
Patrick Mahomes Named 2024 ESPY Winner for Best NFL Player
Almost a year to the date since the last win was revealed, KC Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes is the ESPY winner for Best NFL Player of 2023-24.
Local Reflections
Chiefs to honor former cheerleader who died after childbirth: 'She was a cheerleader for anybody'
This season, the Kansas City Chiefs will honor her life and legacy on game days.
Summer Fare Amid Construction Nightmare
City Barrel Pizza + Patio opens in Waldo with creative pies and craft beer
"We have been looking for a second location in the Brookside/Waldo area for several years now . . . It's a perfect match for us and our brand."
Forecast For Now . . .
Scattered storms today ahead of warmer weather
Dangerous heat returns by the start of next week
Hues Corporation - Rock The Boat is the #TBT song of the day and this is the OPEN THREAD for right now.
